title: Senior DevOps Engineer
job_overview:
Location: Remote (Work from Home)
Job Type: Full-time
Experience: 5–10 years

About Us:
We are on a mission to simplify the purchasing and management of supplies for real-estate properties. Our platform is transforming the way property owners and managers procure essential items, making the process more efficient and cost-effective. Join us in making property management easier and more convenient than ever before.

Role Description:
As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be instrumental in building and maintaining the infrastructure and automation that power our platform. You’ll work alongside a collaborative team of developers and product leaders, ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our systems in a remote-first environment.

Key Responsibilities:
Design, implement, and maintain scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructure (primarily on AWS).

Manage CI/CD pipelines to streamline development and deployment workflows.

Develop and maintain infrastructure-as-code (IaC) using tools like Terraform or CloudFormation.

Monitor and improve system performance, availability, and reliability.

Set up and manage logging, alerting, and iUpgrade to see actual info response systems.

Collaborate with development teams to ensure smooth integration and delivery processes.

Enforce security best practices across infrastructure and deployments.

Qualifications:
Proficiency with cloud platforms, particularly AWS (EC2, ELB, ECR, S3, IAM, VPC, etc.).

Strong experience with containerization and orchestration: Docker, ECS/EKS, or Kubernetes.

Experience with CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, Bitbucket Pipelines, Jenkins, etc.

Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Pulumi.

Understanding of monitoring and logging tools: Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog, CloudWatch, ELK stack, etc.

Basic knowledge of backend systems and familiarity with Laravel, Node.js, or Vue.js is a plus.

Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Self-motivated and comfortable working independently in a remote team.

How to Apply:
If you're a seasoned DevOps engineer eager to support a growing platform that’s improving the property management industry, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you’re interested in this role.
